name: Bmc Helix Remedyforce
description:
Integration of BmcHelixRemedyforce with Cortex XSOAR. BMC Helix Remedyforce integration allows customers to create/update service
  requests and incidents. It also allows to update status, resolve service requests
  and incidents with customer notes. This integration exposes standard ticketing capabilities
  that can be utilized as part of automation & orchestration.
author: Cortex XSOAR
